It analyzes project data from multiple tools where a project is executed (e.g. JIRA, Sonar, etc.) and produces numerous charts, metrics, trends and some predictions based on that data. This helps to see risky areas in the project and make timely improvements. The tool doesn't require any kind of strict workflow in JIRA – it is capable to connect to the project of ANY type by means of a \\\"Project Configuration\\\".
